data.name: Warface — "Phobos" weapon set
data.detailed_description:
About the "Phobos" set


A selection of the player’s favorite guns in the amazing camouflage, which will definitely appeal to connoisseurs of a serious and strict style.



With a set like that, you will never be outmatched on any battlefield!



The kit includes 8 types of weapons that are guaranteed to find their perfect pair!

Phobos AK Alpha

The AK Alpha has an easily controlled recoil and a high rate of fire. Its special ammunition provides increased damage when hitting limbs and additional damage at long distances.

Phobos Typhoon F12

Its balanced characteristics make this weapon a versatile choice for different situations and modes: so you do not have to constantly change the weapons according to combat conditions. Its high accuracy in comparison to other shotguns will effectively make quick work of enemies that get too close.

Phobos Kriss Super V Custom

The Kriss Super V Custom is a unique machine gun in any engineer's arsenal. It still has all the advantages of the Kriss Super V Classic, along with new parameters and unique attachments. Of course, the weapon has an excellent appearance that will keep you in the spotlight.

Phobos CDX-MC Kraken

This powerful bolt-action rifle is a good mashup of everything that snipers love: high damage, the ability to quickly switch in and out of aiming mode, increased damage to the limbs, and a fairly large magazine capacity. In addition, the rifle has the ability to use a silencer and has a unique flame suppressor that increases its piercing ability more than a standard one would.

Phobos M60E4

It is equally suitable for all game modes and does not require any special skills to wield it. It has a spacious magazine with 200 cartridges that will allow you to confidently restrain large groups of enemies both in PvP and PvE modes, but it does have a slower reload time.

Phobos SAP6

Its impressive rate of fire and high damage make the SAP6 one of the best pump shotguns in the game. Its main competitors are the MAG-7 and Fabarm STF 12 Compact when it comes to shooting, accuracy, and magazine capacity.

Phobos PP-2000

The PP-2000 has excellent damage and good shooting accuracy but has a small range. The magazine of the machine gun holds 45 pistol cartridges, which is enough to kill several opponents. The weapon has a standard reloading speed.

Phobos Orsis T-5000

Orsis T-5000 is a bolt-action sniper rifle with one of the biggest damages among other sniper weapons. This weapon is designed for those who love to solve problems with one shot.



Of course, using these weapons can earn you a lot of achievements.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The delightfully eerie weapon series "Phobos" will help you conquer any battle.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
